# Решение домашнего задания к занятию "14.1 Создание и использование секретов"

## Задача 1: Работа с секретами через утилиту kubectl в установленном minikube
```
aledcherry@aledcherry:~$ openssl genrsa -out cert.key 4096
aledcherry@aledcherry:~$ openssl req -x509 -new -key cert.key -days 3650 -out cert.crt \
-subj '/C=RU/ST=Moscow/L=Moscow/CN=server.local'
aledcherry@aledcherry:~$ kubectl create secret tls domain-cert --cert=cert.crt --key=cert.key
secret/domain-cert created
aledcherry@aledcherry:~$ kubectl get secrets
NAME          TYPE                DATA   AGE
domain-cert   kubernetes.io/tls   2      7s
aledcherry@aledcherry:~$ kubectl get secret domain-cert
NAME          TYPE                DATA   AGE
domain-cert   kubernetes.io/tls   2      14s
aledcherry@aledcherry:~$ kubectl describe secret domain-cert
Name:         domain-cert
Namespace:    default
Labels:       <none>
Annotations:  <none>

Type:  kubernetes.io/tls

Data
====
tls.crt:  1944 bytes
tls.key:  3272 bytes
aledcherry@aledcherry:~$ kubectl get secret domain-cert -o yaml
apiVersion: v1
data:
  tls.crt: 
  tls.key: 
kind: Secret
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: "2023-04-02T12:16:21Z"
  name: domain-cert
  namespace: default
  resourceVersion: "600"
  uid: c219d41d-2455-410f-b747-f3e7accf9eac
type: kubernetes.io/tls
aledcherry@aledcherry:~$ kubectl get secret domain-cert -o json
{
    "apiVersion": "v1",
    "data": {
        "tls.crt": "",
        "tls.key": ""
    },
    "kind": "Secret",
    "metadata": {
        "creationTimestamp": "2023-04-02T12:16:21Z",
        "name": "domain-cert",
        "namespace": "default",
        "resourceVersion": "600",
        "uid": "c219d41d-2455-410f-b747-f3e7accf9eac"
    },
    "type": "kubernetes.io/tls"
}
aledcherry@aledcherry:~$ kubectl get secrets -o json > secrets.json
aledcherry@aledcherry:~$ kubectl get secret domain-cert -o yaml > domain-cert.yml
aledcherry@aledcherry:~$ cat secrets.json
{
    "apiVersion": "v1",
    "items": [
        {
            "apiVersion": "v1",
            "data": {
                "tls.crt": "",
                "tls.key": ""
            },
            "kind": "Secret",
            "metadata": {
                "creationTimestamp": "2023-04-02T12:16:21Z",
                "name": "domain-cert",
                "namespace": "default",
                "resourceVersion": "600",
                "uid": "c219d41d-2455-410f-b747-f3e7accf9eac"
            },
            "type": "kubernetes.io/tls"
        }
    ],
    "kind": "List",
    "metadata": {
        "resourceVersion": ""
    }
}
aledcherry@aledcherry:~$ kubectl delete secret domain-cert
secret "domain-cert" deleted
aledcherry@aledcherry:~$ kubectl apply -f domain-cert.yml
secret/domain-cert created
```
